Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
Career Navigator is BYU-Idaho's online database for jobs, internships and career postings.

Register / Log In

Employers & Internship Providers: To access Career Navigator, go to https://byui-csm.symplicity.com/employers/ .  Once there, you can bookmark the site or add it to your favorites if you'd like.

(Students: your link is different, please click here).

New employers may click on the "Register" button, and create their account in a few short minutes. Employers wishing to host BYU-Idaho interns will also sign the Master Internship Agreement during the registration process.

Once you have registered in the site, simply enter your email address and password - and you're in!

Create Your Profile

You now have the ability to create a more extensive company profile for students to view, including the following:

  • Organization Overview
  • Web address
  • Products & Services
  • Divisions & Departments
  • Achievements
  • Awards
  • Future of the Company
  • Stock Symbols & Information
  • Revenue Data
  • Growth Rates and Trends
  • Company Culture
  • Company Logo
  • ...and More!

We invite you to add as much information as possible about your organization, to allow students to get to know your business better!

Fill Your Employment Needs

With Career Navigator, you have the ability to find the students that fill all your employment needs - from a top-rate intern to an experienced graduate ready to start their career.

  • Post Jobs
  • Search Students by Criteria
  • Review Resumes
  • Compile and View Resume Books
  • Schedule Interviews
  • Arrange for On-Campus Recruiting
  • ...and More!
